input: Jekk jogħġbok għid storja dwar il-pandawi.
method1_output:
Il-Pandawi huma liġġ ta' bwies karnivor li jsibu fil-ċina u l-Indja. Hemm șabbara differenti ta' pandawi; il-pandawi l-kbar, il-pandawi l-irkoppu, il-pandawi tas-saghtejn u l-pandawi tar-ruġġ. L-ewwel darba li wkoll l-aħna tal-ħajja għarfu dwar il-pandawi kienet f'dik iż-żona tal-Ċina fejn il-pandawi jispiċċaw mal-arkipelagu tal-Korall. Tista' tkun ħareġ storja dwar il-pandawi fejn tinsab xi dawk iż-żona tal-gżejjer u kif dawn l-annimali ħaqqew mal-popolazzjoni tal-gżejjer.
****************English Meaning****************
Pandas are a type of carnivorous bear found in China and India. There are different types of pandas; the giant panda, the red panda, the Qinling panda, and the recently discovered Arunchal Panda. The first time we learned about pandas and their existence was in the region of China where the pandas culminate in the Coral Archipelago. There may be stories about pandas in some of the island regions and how these animals interact with the island population.
method2_step1_output: Please tell a story about the Pandavas.
method2_step2_output:
Once upon a time, there were five brothers named Yudhishthira, Bhima, Arjuna, Nakula, and Sahadeva. They were the sons of King Pandu and his wives Kunti and Madri. The brothers were known as the Pandavas and they lived in the city of Hastinapura.

The eldest among the brothers, Yudhishthira, was known for his wisdom and honesty. Bhima was known for his strength, Arjuna was known for his archery skills, Nakula was known for his good looks, and Sahadeva was known for his intelligence.

The Pandavas grew up with their cousins, the Kauravas, who were also the sons of King Pandu's brother, Dhritarashtra. However, the Kauravas were jealous of the Pandavas because they were more skilled and loved by their father. The Kauravas constantly plotted against the Pandavas, especially their cousin Duryodhana who was the eldest among them.

One day, King Pandu died and King Dhritarashtra became the new ruler of Hastinapura. However, he decided to give half of the kingdom to the Pandavas as their inheritance. This angered the Kauravas, especially Duryodhana, who felt that he was entitled to the entire kingdom.

Duryodhana challenged the Pandavas to a game of dice, and Yudhishthira accepted the challenge. However, the game was rigged and the Pandavas lost everything, including their kingdom, their wealth, and even their wife Draupadi.

The Pandavas were forced to go into exile for twelve years, followed by a year in hiding. During this time, they faced many challenges, including battles with demons, exposure to harsh weathers, and various betrayals from others.

Finally, when the thirteen years were over, the Pandavas returned to Hastinapura to reclaim their rightful place as rulers. They asked for their kingdom back from the Kauravas, but Duryodhana refused to give it to them. A great war was fought between the two sides, which was called the Kurukshetra War.

The Pandavas had the support of Lord Krishna, who advised them throughout the war. Arjuna fought valiantly and eventually killed Duryodhana in single combat. In the end, the Pandavas emerged victorious and Yudhishthira became the king of Hastinapura.

The Pandavas ruled justly and wisely for many years, with the help of Lord Krishna. They were known for their valor and integrity, and they became legendary heroes in Indian mythology.
method2_final_output:
Ftit iż-żmien ilu qariem xox-xhugħiet James Yudhishthira, Bhima, Arjuna, Nakula, u Sahadeva. Kienu l-ibni tal-King Pandu u l-mara tiegħu Kunti u Madri. L-ix-xhugħiet kienu magħrufa bħala l-Pandavas u kienu jgħixu fis-sitċita ta 'Hastinapura.

Il-akbar minn ix-xhugħiet, Yudhishthira, kienu magħrufin għall-ħsieb u l-ħonestà tiegħu. Bhima kienu magħrufin talli kienu għawwi, Arjuna kienu magħrufin talli kienu ħiliet ta 'bogħod, Nakula kienu magħrufin talli kienu snien tajbin u Sahadeva kienu magħrufin talli kienu intelliġenti.

Il-Pandavas żvaw fit-tul ma' ċ-ċementi tagħhom, iċ-ċarnivali, ir-Kauravas, li kienu wkoll l-ibni tal-axxuzz tal-King Pandu, Dhritarashtra. Madankollu, il-Kauravas kienu ħażin minn il-Pandavas għax kienu iktar iqatta' u magħbija mid-dar tagħhom. Il-Kauravas daqqu kjami kontra l-Pandavas, speċjalment il-kuzin Duryodhana, li kienu l-akbar minnhom.

Darba, King Pandu miet u King Dhritarashtra daħal il-post ta 'ruler ġdida ta' Hastinapura. Madankollu, iddeċieda jġib nofs is-saff tal-madwar l-ekwivalent tas-sengħa għall-Pandavas bħala eredità tagħhom. Dan baqgħa xufiek tar-Kauravas, speċjalment Duryodhana, li tħoss li huwa intitolat għall-pajjiż kollu.

Duryodhana għadda lill-Pandavas għall-logħba ta 'cartijiet, u Yudhishthira aċċetta l-ħidma. Madankollu, il-logħba kienet tricked u l-Pandavas żdiedu kollox, inkluż il-pajjiż tagħhom, il-ħwienet, u anke l-maraduża tagħhom Draupadi.

Il-Pandavas kienu forzat li jmurun fil-esilju għal tnax-il sena, segwit minn sena fil-ħżiena. Matul dan il-ħin, wrew ħafna sfidi, inklużi b'ħaddiem, espożizjoni għażliet ta 'ħwejjeġ, u tradimenti vari mill-oħrajn.

Finalment, meta ħamsa u tnax-il sena ktar, il-Pandavas ernu lura għall-Hastinapura biex jiclaimaw il-post tagħhom bħala rulers. Talbu l-pajjiż tagħhom lura mill-Kauravas, imma Duryodhana rrifja billi ma jiddahalix ġiebha. L-gwerra kbira ġie mħallat bejn is-sitwazzjonijiet, li kienet iqagħad Kurukshetra War.

Il-Pandavas kellhom l-appoġġ tas-Surmien Krishan, li jirreġisti dak kollu fil-gwerra. Arjuna qattel b'ħażen u eventwalment qatal Duryodhana bil-kunflitt wieħed. Fl-aħħar, il-Pandavas ħadu s-sħabi tagħhom bi żbalji u dejjem tajbin, u saru irħula li jahdmu biex is-snin ġejjin jirnexxielhom b'mod ġust u tajjeb.

input: Jekk jogħġbok, aħna nidħlu skema tad-dizinn intern ta 'styl Nordiku.
method1_output:
B'pjaċir! Skema Nordiku hi skema sempliċiżta u modċifika tad-dizinn ċara li jiffoka fuq il-kuluri netti, linji ċari u tratti sempliċi. Liema kuluri tixtieq tuża? Uffiċjalment, skema Nordiku tinkludi it-trabti u l-abjad, minflok li tużaħ l-kuluri bħall-blum, aktar eżotika. Hawnhekk huma żewġ eżempji ta 'skemi Nordiku biex tibda: 

1. Sett ta 'kuluri li jinkludu l-abjad, l-ispazji tan-nofs, u l-abbuż ta qawsalla fil-kuluri beż u griż.

2. Sett ta 'kuluri li jinkludu il-bjanka, l-ivory, u l-abjad, mal-kuluri mintax u beige b'ftit qawsalla qawwija ta 'turqizz. 

Forsi tkun interessat ukoll li żid xi aċċessorji skond dan id-dizinn, bħal ma huma spali u kuxjenza tal-bernardelli, daqsxejn tat-daqs ta 'skema Nordiku.
****************English Meaning****************
With pleasure! The Nordic scheme is a simple and modified design that focuses on clean colors, clear lines, and simple strokes. What colors do you want to use? Officially, the Nordic scheme includes black and white, instead of using more exotic colors like blue. Here are two examples of Nordic schemes to get started:

1. A set of colors that includes black and white, shades of gray, and a touch of brown in the beige color family.

2. A set of colors that includes white, ivory, and black, with minimal and beige colors with a bit of strong turquoise.

You may also be interested in adding accessories according to this design, such as Bernardelli's shelves and knowledge, which are similar to the size of the Nordic scheme.
method2_step1_output: Please, we want to implement a Nordic style interior design scheme.
method2_step2_output:
Sure, here are some tips for implementing a Nordic style interior design scheme:

1. Light color palette: Nordic interior design typically features a light color palette with white or muted tones as the dominant colors. This helps create a bright and airy feeling in the space.

2. Use natural materials: Nordic design focuses on using natural materials such as wood, stone, and wool. These materials add warmth and texture to the space.

3. Minimalist design: Nordic design is known for its minimalist and functional design. Keep the space clutter-free and only include essential furniture pieces.

4. Incorporate hygge: Hygge, which roughly translates to coziness, is a key element of Nordic design. Add soft blankets, candles, and other cozy elements to create a warm and inviting atmosphere.

5. Emphasize natural light: Since Nordic countries have long winters and short days, natural light is a key element of their interior design. Try to incorporate large windows and use light-colored window treatments to maximize natural light in the space.

6. Bring in greenery: Adding plants and greenery can help bring life and freshness to a Nordic-style interior. Choose plants that are easy to care for and thrive in low light conditions.

Overall, the key to implementing a Nordic style interior design scheme is to keep things simple, natural, and cozy. With these tips in mind, you can create a beautiful and inviting space that feels both modern and timeless.
method2_final_output:
Sigur, hawn huma ftit tifsiriet għal jimplimentaw skema ta 'dizinju tal-interni tal-Pola Nordika:

1. Paletta ta 'kuluri hafifa: t-tas-sajf Nordic tal-dizinju tal-interni jagħti tipikament paletta ta 'kuluri hafifa bil-bijanca jew toni mmurat bħala l-kuluri dominanti. Dan jgħin biex jinħoloq feeling dawl u ajru fil-ħidma.

2. Uża materjali naturali: id-dizinju tal-Pola Nordika jiffoka fuq użu ta 'materjali naturali bħall-ħarixa, il-ġebla u l-qoton. Dawn il-materjali jżid il-ħela u t-tekstura fil-ħidma.

3. Dizinju minimalistiku: id-dizinju ta 'Pola Nordika hu magħruf għad-dizinju minimalistiku u funzjonali. Iżżomm id-dritt mingħajr ċ-ċmara u inkluż biss pjaciri ta 'arf jew iżjed.

4. F'inkorpora hygge: Hygge, li b'mod approssimatt jitradda għall-konfort, huwa element ewlieni tad-dizinju tal-Pola Nordika. Żid ċidità tkoppja, ċerati u oħrajn iżjed kokku biex toħloq atmosfera tajba u mistiedna.

5. Emfasizza dawl naturali: Għalkemm pajjiżi Nordiċi għandhom iwaqqa' twissijiet u ġranet qasira, id-dawl naturali huwa element ewlieni fl-ħidma tagħhom. Pprova inkorporazzjoni ta 'vitrine kbir u użu ta' trattamenti ta 'ħitan ħafif biex tmaxxa d-dawl naturali fil-ħidma.

6. Aħtiġ żrinġ: Żidjiet ta 'pianta u aħħar jistgħu jgħinu biex jibdew il-ħajja u l-freshness f'interni tal-Pola Nordika. Agħżel bjar li huma faċli biex jittrattaw u jħallsu mingħajr dawl u kondizzjonijiet ta 'nur baxx.

F'kuntest kemm huwa ċar li jimplimentaw skema ta 'dizinju tal-interni tal-Pola Nordika huwa liex, naturali u skiizzi. B'dawn it-tifsiriet f'moħħek, tista'toħloq spaċċ tal-pejża bħalija u mistiedna li jiġi sentit bħal modern u ħazin.

input: Jekk jogħġbok implementa l-algoritmu Support Vector Machine b'mod uża Python.
method1_output:
B'plac soltu, il-bidu tal-implimentazzjoni ta 'Support Vector Machine bil-Python titulari l-kmjuni të żvilupp, b'idejn algoritmu ta 'tweġiba lineari. L-istess attivita tista 'tkun implementata b'pjattaforma oħra kif tfisser JAVA minn Java Development Company.

1. Installazzjoni ta 'sistema bil-Python

L-ewwel pass għandu jkun l-istallazzjoni ta 'sistema Python:

``` python
sudo apt-get update
sudo apt-get install python3.6
```

2. Importa il-biblijoteka ta 'użu tal-support vector machine

Imbagħad bħal dawk li kienu jippreżentaw it-teknoloġija SVM, tkellem importa tal-biblijoteka ta 'Python dapprima. Tinstab:

``` python
import sklearn
from sklearn import svm
```

3. Dejta train-test split

Warajk, għandek bżonn dejta training u test split. Ħafna drabi, il-qasam ta 'dati li bħalissa ssir l-indirizz ta' training u test split huwa xi wieħed li jirriżulta mill-data li għamltha m'utilizzare 'pandas' jekk tista tgħarbel, minflok tgħamelhażen.

Huwa importanti li fil-qasam ta 'training biex twassal l-algoritmu tiegħek lejn soluzzjoni li tistenna, jista 'jkollok idoqq biex tqassam il-qasam ta' datu ta 'training u ta' test.

``` python
from sklearn.model_selection import train_test_split

data_train_new, data_test_new = train_test_split(training_data, test_size=0.25)
```

4. Ħatra, u frażżiċitajiet

F'(SVM), ma jistax ikun hemm żbalji f'caratteristiċi. Huwa importanti li tassigura li każ kull attribut jeżistix u mhux qiegħed bil-merħba. Huwa wkoll importanti li tippreserva l-informazzjoni kollha użata matul il-proċess ta 'trejnament. Barra minn hekk, il-kaxxa ta 'ħatra u l-frażżiċitajiet tal-ħatra tal-istess datutunu jistgħu jibdew irrilevanti fi statistika ġenerali. Huwa possibbli li ma tintgħatax informazzjoni biduża, imma tistaż żen tiġi żgur li kull annotazzjoni hija korretta. 

5. SVM fit

Barra minn hekk, u minħabba l-fatti preċedenti, nista 'bbiss fil-Hyperparameters tas-support vector machine. Bħalissa, bil-mod ġenerali bil-biblijoteka Python, SVM huwa bard especjali gdida li dan jimplika li jkun sar lill-magna specifikata fejn tista 'tagħmel żbalji (Għadd, Qċima, tiġdid, eċċ.) 

``` python
from sklearn import svm

clf = svm.SVC(kernel='linear')
clf.fit(data_train_new, label_train_new)
```

6. Predict

L-istess kif ma jarawx ħafna bilanċ fil-machine learning ma 'excess activity ċessiva u / jew redundanza, il-machine learning giet ħafna simili. Mnejn għal kull estimatur huwa bil-għalqa ta 'l-istess qasam ta' testimji u test idsparament.

``` python
from sklearn.metrics import accuracy_score

accuracy_score(label_test_new, clf.predict(data_test_new))
```

Konkluzzjoni

M'hijiex żejjed li wieħed jista 'jgħin dwar kemm huwa sempliċi liż-żvilupp ta' algoritmi fil-machine learning bir-rida ta 'Python u tagħmlu użu migħqud ta' dawk li qed jintużaw bħal mod ta 'implementazzjoni. It-testament ta 'dan il-modu huwa l-kontroll u l-prestazzjoni qawwija ta' support vector machine fi żmien tfulitu, u jissodisfa liema
****************English Meaning****************
With ease of implementation, the implementation of Support Vector Machine with Python started with the development of the junior title, using a linear response algorithm. The same activity can be implemented on another platform like Java from Java Development Company.

1. Python System Installation

The first step should be the installation of the Python system:

``` python
sudo apt-get update
sudo apt-get install python3.6
```

2. Importing the support vector machine library

Then, like those who presented SVM technology, import the Python library first. You can find it here:

``` python
import sklearn
from sklearn import svm
```

3. Train-Test Split

Afterwards, you need a train-test split data. Often, the data field that currently does the training address and the test split is one that results from the data that I used to 'pandas' if it can be combined, instead of just done.

It is important that in the training field and lead your algorithm towards the expected solution, you can divide the training data and test data field.

``` python
from sklearn.model_selection import train_test_split

data_train_new, data_test_new = train_test_split(training_data, test_size=0.25)
```

4. Data Imputation and Normalization

In SVM, there cannot be errors in attribute characteristics. It is important to ensure that each attribute is present and not omitted. It is also important to preserve all the information used during the training process. Apart from that, the box plot and frequency of the same data set may become irrelevant in general statistics. It is possible to obtain unusable information, but it can be ensured that each annotation is correct.

5. SVM Fit

Apart from that, and due to previous facts, I can discuss Hyperparameters of Support Vector Machine. Now, as a general rule with the Python library, the SVM is a special function that implies that it has been made more specific where errors can be made (Count, Leaving, Correction, etc.)

``` python
from sklearn import svm

clf = svm.SVC(kernel='linear')
clf.fit(data_train_new, label_train_new)
```

6. Predict

Like a balanced machine learning, there is not much excess activity or redundancy, and machine learning is very similar. Each estimator needs the same test set and test IDs.

``` python
from sklearn.metrics import accuracy_score

accuracy_score(label_test_new, clf.predict(data_test_new))
```

Conclusion

It cannot be denied that one can help with how easy it is to develop algorithms in machine learning with the aim of Python and using the implementation mode. The testament of this mode is the strong control and performance of support vector machine in its time of deployment and satisfies which.
method2_step1_output: Please implement the Support Vector Machine algorithm using Python.
method2_step2_output:
Sure, here's an implementation of Support Vector Machine algorithm using Python:

```python
# Import necessary libraries
import numpy as np
from sklearn import datasets
from sklearn.pipeline import Pipeline
from sklearn.preprocessing import StandardScaler
from sklearn.svm import SVC

# Load the iris dataset
iris = datasets.load_iris()
X = iris["data"][:, (2, 3)] # petal length, petal width
y = (iris["target"] == 2).astype(np.float64) # Iris-Virginica

# Create a Support Vector Machine classifier
svm_clf = Pipeline([
        ("scaler", StandardScaler()),
        ("linear_svc", SVC(kernel="linear", C=1))
    ])
svm_clf.fit(X, y)

# Evaluate the SVM classifier
from sklearn.metrics import accuracy_score
y_pred = svm_clf.predict(X)
acc = accuracy_score(y, y_pred)
print("Accuracy:", acc)
```

This code uses the iris dataset to train a SVM classifier on petal length and petal width. It uses a linear kernel function and sets the value of C to 1. The SVC class is used from scikit-learn library to perform SVM classification. We are scaling the data using the `StandardScaler` class to normalize the features and remove the effect of range differences between different features. Finally, we print the accuracy of the classifier.
method2_final_output:
Iva, ħawnhekk hemm l-implementazzjoni tal-algoritmu ta' Support Vector Machine b'mod użanti il-Python:

```python
# Fittex l-libreriji neċessarji
import numpy kif np
mis-sklearn importa datasets
mis-sklearn.pipeline importa Pipeline
mis-sklearn.preprocessing importa StandardScaler
mis-sklearn.svm importa SVC

# Itella' l-istudju fuq id-data tal-iris
iris = datasets.load_iris()
X = iris["data"][:, (2, 3)] # kisem għoli, wiesa' tal-kisem
y = (iris["targħet"] == 2).astype(np.float64) # Iris-Virginica

# Oħloq il-klassifikatur ta' Support Vector Machine
svm_clf = Pipeline([
        ("scaler", StandardScaler()),
        ("linear_svc", SVC(kernel="linear", C=1))
    ])
svm_clf.fit(X, y)

# Valuta l-klassifikatur ta' SVM
mis-sklearn.metrics importa accuracy_score
y_pred = svm_clf.predict(X)
acc = accuracy_score(y, y_pred)
print("Aċċuratezza:", acc)
```

Dan il-kodiċi juża d-data tas-iris biex jiffitjaw klassifikatur ta' SVM fuq il-kisem għoli u wiesa' tal-kisem. Jżur funzjoni kernel linearu u jistabbilixxi l-valur ta' C għal 1. Il-klassifkatrur SVC jitilizza mis-sklearn librerija biex jagħmel klassifikazzjoni ta' SVM. Qed iskalaw id-data b'mod użanti l-klassi `StandardScaler` biex nnormalizzaw il-karatteristiċi u nieqfu l-effett ta' differenzi fir-range bejn karatteristiċi diffrienti. Finalment, inkunu naraw l-aċċuratezza tal-klassifikatur.

input: Jekk jogħġbok jġenera titolu li jibni fuq il-kontenut li ġej: CBA Timxwieqa żewġ Squawki u l-Kowċijiet għal "logħob negattiv" fil-Playoffs F'17 ta 'April, l-Assocjazzjoni ta' Basketball ta 'Ċina (CBA) ħeldu brieffing tal-ikeltas fejn ninfurmaw il-punizzjonijiet tal-Lions Shanghai Jushilong u l-Kenitex fi Suzhou timijiet tal-baskitball. It-timijiet pponew sanzjonijiet minħabba "logħba negattiva" tagħhom f'żewġ logħob kritiċi fil-playoffs ta 'CBA. Bħala riżultat, il-CBA kkanċella r-rankings u l-partiċipazzjoni taż-żewġ timijiet għall-istaġun u kkaxxa l-finanzjament tal-ligaa tagħhom b '5 miljun yuan. Il-kowċijiet taż-żewġ timijiet rispettivi kienu wkoll jesperjenzaw penali, fejn Li Chunjiang u Li Nan, il-kowċijiet prinċipali tal-Lions Shanghai Jushilong u l-Kenitex fi Suzhou rispettivament, twieldu il-licenzji tal-kowċar għal ħames u tliet snin. Shilinjie, il-maniġer ġenerali tal-Kenitex, u Jiang Yusheng, il-maniger ġenerali tal-Jushilong, jesperjenzaw ukoll sospensjonijiet ta 'ħames u tliet snin. Skont is-skedina oriġinali, ir-round it-tieni ta 'dan is-sena tal-playoffs ta' CBA kienet mistennija tibda nhar il-lejl bil-ħruġ bejn Shenzhen Marco Polo u Lions Shanghai Jushilong. Madankollu, bħala riżultat tal-ban, Shenzhen Marco Polo rnexxielu juru pass fl-addoċċ għall-semifinali. Zhang Xiong, CEO tal-CBA,  spjega li l-punizzjonijiet kienu f'liġi diciplinarja tal-ligaa u dipendew mill-estent u r-riċonoxximent tal-vjolazzjoni. Yao Ming, Chairman tal-CBA, esprima anki rwieħbu dwar il-punizzjoni, bi fih ta' l-importanza tat-tul fil-logħob sportiv fuq il-ħila. Hu taħt it-tama li permezz ta' din l-avveniment, il-ligaa tinbidel għal aħjar u tinħoloq iżjed suċċessi valorużi.
method1_output:
Punizzjonijiet tal-Lions Shanghai Jushilong u l-Kenitex fi Suzhou timijiet tal-baskitball ġew imponuti mill-CBA wara logħba negattiva fil-playoffs ta 'CBA f'April. Il-CBA kkanċella r-rankings u l-partiċipazzjoni taż-żewġ timijiet għall-istaġun u kkaxxa l-finanzjament tal-ligaa tagħhom b '5 miljun yuan. Iż-żewġ kowċijiet prinċipali jesperjenzaw penali, u żewġ maniġers ġenerali jesperjenzaw ukoll sospensjonijiet. Zhang Xiong, CEO tal-CBA, spjega li l-punizzjonijiet kienu f'liġi diciplinarja tal-ligaa.
****************English Meaning****************
Punishments have been imposed on the Shanghai Jushilong Lions and Kenitex in Suzhou for basketball violations by the CBA after a negative playoff game in April. The CBA cancelled the rankings and participation of both teams for the season and withdrew their league funding by 5 million yuan. The two main coaches experienced penalties, and two general managers also faced suspensions. Zhang Xiong, CEO of the CBA explained that the punishments were under the league's disciplinary law.
method2_step1_output:
Please generate a title based on the content provided: CBA Penalizes Two Basketball Teams for "Negative Play" in April 17 Playoffs

The Chinese Basketball Association (CBA) held a briefing on the penalties imposed on Lions Shanghai Jushilong and Kenitex basketball teams in Suzhou for their "negative play" in two critical playoff games of CBA. As a result, CBA canceled the rankings and participation of both teams for the season and cut off their league funding by 5 million yuan. The respective coaches of both teams also received penalties, with Li Chunjiang and Li Nan, the head coaches of Lions Shanghai Jushilong and Kenitex in Suzhou respectively, losing their coaching licenses for five and three years. Shilinjie, the general manager of Kenitex, and Jiang Yusheng, the general manager of Jushilong, also received suspensions for five and three years respectively. According to the original schedule, the second round of the playoffs of CBA was expected to begin on the night between Shenzhen Marco Polo and Lions Shanghai Jushilong. However, as a result of the ban, Shenzhen Marco Polo managed to secure a pass to the semifinals. Zhang Xiong, CEO of CBA, explained that the penalties were part of the league's disciplinary law and depended on the extent and recognition of the violation. Yao Ming, Chairman of CBA, also expressed his support for the punishment, emphasizing the importance of long-term development of sportsmanship. Hu hopes that through this event, the league will become better and create more valuable successes.
